sentences.en: A damp wind blew from the west.
sentences.cn: 从西面吹来一股潮湿的风。

sentences.en: a west-facing window
sentences.cn: 朝西的窗户

sentences.en: Far off to the west the sun was sinking.
sentences.cn: 远处夕阳西下。

sentences.en: farmers in West Africa
sentences.cn: 西非的农民

sentences.en: He started with a good holiday in Key West, Florida.
sentences.cn: 他先去佛罗里达的基韦斯特岛度了个愉快的假期。

sentences.en: He was headmaster of a public school in the West of England.
sentences.cn: 他是英格兰西部一所公学的校长。

sentences.en: I pushed on towards Flagstaff, a hundred miles to the west.
sentences.cn: 我继续西行，向100英里外的弗拉格斯塔夫进发。

sentences.en: I'm sorry to have to tell you that Janet West is dead.
sentences.cn: 很遗憾，我不得不告诉您，珍妮特·韦斯特已经不在人世。

sentences.en: T-shirts now seem almost de rigueur in the West End.
sentences.cn: T恤衫现在几乎成了伦敦西区时尚人士的必备之物。

sentences.en: The convoy wound its way through the West Bank.
sentences.cn: 车队曲曲折折地穿过约旦河西岸。

sentences.en: The route then heads west over Gerrick Moor.
sentences.cn: 之后这条路折向西，穿过格里克漠泽。

sentences.en: the west door of the church
sentences.cn: 教堂的西门

sentences.en: The West is getting a heavy dose of snow and rain today.
sentences.cn: 西部今天将迎来一场大的雨夹雪。

sentences.en: There is a chance of sunny spells in the West.
sentences.cn: 西部可能会有一段天气晴朗的日子。

sentences.en: There’s a slight chance of some sunshine in the west.
sentences.cn: 西部地区见晴的可能性不大。

sentences.en: This south-west region of France is the home of claret.
sentences.cn: 法国西南部的这个地区是干红葡萄酒的产地。

sentences.en: We took a plane south-west across the Anatolian plateau to Cappadocia.
sentences.cn: 我们乘飞机向着西南方向越过安纳托利亚高原，前往卡帕多西亚。

sentences.en: West had to decide whether to play a heart.
sentences.cn: 韦斯特必须决定是否要出一张红桃。

sentences.en: West Hampstead has a variety of good shops and supermarkets.
sentences.cn: 西汉普斯特德有各种各样不错的店铺和超级市场。

sentences.en: West was wilfully blind to the abuse that took place.
sentences.cn: 韦斯特对发生的虐待行为故意视而不见。

sentences.en: Whereas West Germans drink wine, their Eastern cousins prefer Schnapps.
sentences.cn: 西德人喝葡萄酒，而他们东德的兄弟姐妹则喜欢喝杜松子酒。

words.tran_cn: 西方的，西部的；有西方特征的
西方人；西部片，西部小说
西方人，欧美人；美国西部的人

phrases.tran_cn: n. 美国远西区（落矶山至太平洋沿岸的地区）；美国中西部（尤指密西西比河西部地区）
(英，非正式)被杀死，上西天；遇到灾难
西德（原德意志联邦共和国的简称）
西大荒；蛮荒的美国西部

trans.tran_en: in the west or facing the west
the direction towards which the sun goes down, and which is on the left if you are facing north
